pages.title: Piglin's Prize
pages.text: $(o)You manage to establish some sort of truce with the Piglins. They inform you of the Piglin Brutes: ruthless barbarians that stole the Piglin's most treasured artifact. They currently reside in the now-ruined Bastions, which were previously the hallmarks of Piglin civilization. You wonder if its time for payback.$()
